Summary: wow appeared like a fire work in the sky
trends: There have been no other sightings in eagle river bc
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsso like i said took my attention like a firework in the sky appeared and then hovered, and started moving erratically, but in the same general area.So i woke my friend up and he came onto the front deck i said watch that light.He found it and it was still and then it started moving up and down all around he was wtf thank you for waking me up then i woke my gf up and she was grumpy but was like wtf. We watched for 30 mins or so and it moved and stayed in the same general area, seemed to be 2 objects at times and would become one.Very weird movements, you wold wonder what moves like that is an alien teaching his teenager to drive? started around midnight and it is 126 am i will check and see if it is still there.yes it is i tryed to take pictures but nothing i have will work in the night sky! anyways 3 witnesses so very strange light!
